sentence:
• Shares of 21Vianet Group, Inc. ( VNET ) declined 2.1% after posting fourth quarter loss per share of $0.20, contrary to the Zacks Consensus Estimate of breakeven
• United Natural Foods, Inc.'s ( UNFI ) shares slumped 8.5% after reporting second quarter fiscal 2015 adjusted earnings per share of $0.65, a cent lower than the Zacks Consensus Estimate
• Shares of Credit Suisse Group AG ( CS ) jumped 6.7% after announcing that U.K.-based insurer Prudential PLC's existing CEO, Tidjane Thiam, will replace present CEO Brady Dougan
• The Procter & Gamble Company's ( PG ) shares dropped 1.9% following news that the company may face a fine of $958,000 in China over the allegations regarding false advertising
